title: Stir-fried Sesame Prawns
ingredients: ['40 peeled raw tiger prawns, about 350g in total, thawed if frozen', '1 tbsp toasted sesame oil', '11/2 tbsp dark soy sauce', '1 tbsp sunflower oil', '1 large medium-hot red chilli, seeded and finely chopped', '1 garlic clove, crushed', '1 lemongrass stalk, outer leaves removed and the core finely chopped', '2 tsp ginger pur√©e or grated fresh root ginger', '1 tsp light soft brown sugar', '1 tbsp sesame seeds', '2 tbsp chopped fresh coriander', 'sweet chilli dipping sauce, to serve']
